Sorry, I'm not familiar with how League's streaming works, if it exists at all for the college teams. Will we be given a chance to watch the final four play against each other somewhere [on the interwebs]? Thanks!

Yes indeed! You'll be able to watch live this saturday at www.2015nacc.com and Twitch.tv. Also, if you head over to the 2015NACC.com website you can find a ton of information to help catch you up with the scene in preparation for this weekend.

Riot;
I started playing league more recently than most, around 1.5 years ago.  I have never gotten very far in the ranked queue, but have recently taken more of an interest in ranked games.  The trouble with ranked games is that I main support and i can never seem to find a duo partner.  I am in an esports club at USC and have a few friends who can adc, but not competently.  Why don't you include an optional tinder-esque feature (since you are already making changes to the friends tab) and allow summoners to friend other summoners within, say, a 20-mile radius?

why riot keep match me with intentional feed players, why I cant carry my team with the absolutely advantage in my lines. why there always some feeders stop me to earn the rank points. riot you can check my history, if my KDA is not carry amount my team, you can report me.
